title: Pomoclone
info: A time management timer following the Pomodoro technique, inspired by pomofocus.io. Planning to later incorpate d3.js

title: React Portfolio
info: (This website!) A single page application displaying my recent works.

title: To Do List
info: A simple CRUD application that allows users to add, delete, and modify their to do list with tasks.
tech: Python3, Flask, Flask Admin, Flask Security, SQLAlchemy, SQLite, Bootstrap

title: Out-of-The-Woods
info: A safety mobile application developed for a Software Engineering class by a team of Computer Science students. Developed for iOS and Android.

title: Emotion Recognition
info: (Offline) Worked with another Computer Science student to train a neural network to identify different types of human facial emotions.

title: Vehicle Search: Color Identification
info: Worked on a team to develop a vehicle recognition program based on model & color using Machine Learning concepts. I was soley responsible for the color identification portion which I classified using the K-Means algorithm.
